show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: and Dr Z
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, AHG, AHN-BC, www.naturalnurse.com interviews JJ Virgin, CNS, CHFS. JJ Virgin is a top fitness and nutrition expert, and media personality.
Her 25 years in the health and fitness industry, with a focus on holistic nutrition and functional medicine, have earned JJ recognition as the go-to weight loss expert who can unlock the door to lifelong weight management through a sensible, no-fail approach to nutrition and fitness.
JJ is author of NY Times bestseller The Virgin Diet: Drop 7 Foods, Lose 7 Pounds, Just 7 Days.
The Virgin Diet has also been a bestseller in The Wall Street Journal, USA Today, the Chicago Tribune, and numerous other media outlets.
JJ is also the author of Six Weeks to Sleeveless and Sexy, and co-starred on the TLC reality series, “Freaky Eaters”.
Contact: http://jjvirgin.com
